version_description:
- Warning: Please Re-export your keystone to be able to sign transaction again, otherwise it will fail. Changed mechanism for storing keystore.

We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens

- Import your wallet from any app that supports files.
- Avoid adding duplicate wallets
- Fixed registering push notifications
- Show loading indicator on 
- Fixed crashing on undefined QR codes

We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens

- Transfer your ERC20 tokens! you been waiting for it! 
- Import private key as your wallet! 
- More details button in transaction view

More changes coming to improve your transactions list, to see specific tokens you transfer and receive! This is just a beginning of our journey.

- Present current token balance when sending ERC20 token
- Fixed a bug which caused an error when you send over 1000 units. Thanks to Traf
- Show appropriate currency symbol on confirmation page

Keep sending us feedback

- Partnered up with Coinbase to let you deposit ETH right into Trust Wallet
- Increased gas limit for transactions to avoid out of gas errors when transferring to an exchange
- Avoid db storage backup to the iCloud

- Moved Tokens into separate tab, so you can quickly switch between transactions and tokens
- Integration with Shape Shift will let you deposit funds into your wallet
- Tired of pasting address into recipient address field? it is simplied now
We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens

iOS version is relesed. Here is what's new:

- Wanchain, VeChain support
- Improvements to update balance when new transaction is sent
- Swipe to send token from the Wallet screen
- Requires passcode to see the backup phrase
- Options to sort by balance, token value
- Market feature to monitor token graphs and charts
- Improved web3 capabilities

- Wanchain, VeChain support
- Improvements to update balance when new transaction is sent
- Swipe to send token from the Wallet screen
- Requires passcode to see the backup phrase
- Options to sort by balance, token value
- Market feature to monitor token graphs and charts
- Improved web3 capabilities

- Tron (TRX) Integration
- Improve search functionality 
- Added request and select asset functionality on receive screen
- Improve web3 capabilities  
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Tron (TRX) Integration
- Improve search functionality 
- Added request and select asset functionality on receive screen
- Improve web3 capabilities 
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
* Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bitcoin (BTC) Support

- Support for TomoChain
- Improved token pricing
- Fixed max total value if token pricing is missing
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Dash coin support
* Improved on boarding experience

* Improved TRON (TRX) transfer
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* A new DApp Store, now DApp can be run with any network.
* Faster balance update for ERC20 tokens.
* Improve balance of TRC10.
* Smart Contract Call shows in the transaction history.
* Recovery Phrase UI was improved.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* A new DApp Store, now DApp can be run with any network.
* Faster balance update for ERC20 tokens.
* Improve the ​balance of TRC10.
* Smart Contract Call shows in the transaction history.
* Recovery Phrase UI was improved.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Support for Zcash
* Added the ability to resume DApp browser for easy interaction with the DApp
* DApp Browser, add any links to your bookmarks
* TrueUSD estimate gas limit calculation was fixed
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Support for Zcoin and Zcash
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Ripple (XRP) Support
- Buy crypto with a credit card is now supported! You can buy BTC, ETH, LTC, BCH, XRP directly in the app.
- Search tokens improved

- Ripple (XRP) Support
- Buy crypto with a credit card is now supported! You can buy BTC, ETH, LTC, BCH, XRP directly in the app.
- Search tokens improved

- Steller (XLM), AION (AION), Nimiq (NIM), Thunder Token (TT), Kin (KIN) support
- Buy crypto with EUR is now supported
- Stability improvements

- Steller (XLM), AION (AION), Nimiq (NIM), Thunder Token (TT), Kin (KIN) support
- Buy crypto with EUR is now supported
- Stability improvements

- Stability improvements

- Stability improvements

- Doge and Theta support

- Added ability to buy crypto from the wallet screen
- Speed up transaction loading speed
- Stability improvements
- Better handling for Tezos transaction send

- Binance Chain and BEP2 support
- WalletConnect support
- Cosmos support
- Stability improvements

- Binance Chain and BEP2 support

- Cosmos support
- Ontology support

- Stability improvements

- Qtum / Groestlcoin / Viacoin support

- Zilliqa (ZIL) support
- Ravencoin (RVN) support
- Binance DEX support
- Stability improvements

- Waves (WAVES) support
- Added an option to disable biometric authentication for better security, if you prefer to only use a passcode instead
- Improved WalletConnect interface
- Added BTCB and USDSB pairs to the DEX

We have added support for developers to sign transactions across multiple networks as Cosmos, Binance, Ethereum, check out https://developer.trustwallet.com/wallet-connect/dapp for more information

- KyberSwap for ERC20 tokens
- Added fast way to switch between wallets on long-press on the wallet tab
- DEX token selection, added the ability to search
- Waves (WAVES) support
- Added an option to disable biometric authentication for better security, if you prefer to only use a passcode instead
- Improved WalletConnect interface
- Added BTCB and USDSB pairs to the DEX

We have added support for developers to sign transactions across multiple networks as Cosmos, Binance, Ethereum, check out https://developer.trustwallet.com/wallet-connect/dapp for more information

- Improved WalletConnect connectivity 
- Improved Kyber Swap flow
- æternity (AE) support
- Improved search functionality for DEX assets

- Push notifications for in and outgoing transactions
- Scan memo field with QR code
- æternity (AE) balance fixed

⁃ Add Nebulas(NAS) support 
 ⁃ Improve DEX for swapping ERC20 tokens
 ⁃ Add auto sign toggle for WalletConnect

- Add FIO support. Reserve your FIO address now. (mainnet not launched yet)
- Support QR Code's input data
- Improved fetching for bitcoin transactions
- Bengali, Hindi, Korean, Turkish, Latvian, Portuguese, Romanian languages were added
- Stability improvements

- Decred (DCR) Support
- Collectibles (ERC721) Transfer support
- Ability to customize Bitcoin transaction fee

Trust Wallet is the simplest and most reliable application for buying, exchanging and managing cryptocurrency. This update contains bug fixes, new features and performance improvements.

- Binance DEX Order Book support. Enjoy real time trading experience
- TRC20 token support

Trust Wallet is the simplest and most reliable application for buying, exchanging and managing cryptocurrency.

- Alrorand (ALGO) coin support
- Binance DEX Order Book support. Enjoy real time trading experience

Trust Wallet is the simplest and most reliable application for buying, exchanging and managing cryptocurrency. This update contains bug fixes, new features and performance improvements.

- Improve Tezos Staking experience
- Add Tron (TRX) staking natively
- Add Kava (KAVA) support + staking
- Add Algorand to Finance

Trust Wallet is the simplest and most reliable application for buying, exchanging and managing cryptocurrency. This update contains bug fixes, new features and performance improvements.

- ONT Staking is now available. You can claim ONG rewards
- Improved Deep Linking support
- Improved user experience for UTXO based blockchains. Now auto change address is disabled by default to avoid confusion for the new users. You can enable in Additional Settings.

Trust Wallet is the simplest and most reliable application for buying, exchanging and managing cryptocurrency. This update contains bug fixes, new features and performance improvements.
Trust Wallet is the simplest and most reliable application for buying, exchanging and managing cryptocurrency. This update contains bug fixes, new features and performance improvements.

- Add Coin/Token description on the market screen.
- QR Scanner now allows you to scan URL, Payment URI and Deep Links, one QR scanner for all.
- Add ability to hide balances for better privacy.

- Add Notification Center to see activity on your wallet

- WalletConnect is now located in the settings

- Trust SDK support

- Elrond (eGLD) Support

- Price Alerts Feature: Get alerts for significant price changes of your favorite cryptocurrencies.
- DEX tab visible for smart chain wallets now
- AION coin sending works as usual

- Price Alerts Feature: Add any cryptocurrencies to track significant price changes.
- XRP coin sending with destination tag works as usual.
- TRC20 sending issue fixed.

- Support adding TRC20 and TRC10 custom tokens
- Approve token on the first swap action improved
- Allowed to import Ripple (XRP) wallet via recovery phrase and address
- Fixed fee calculation for Filecoin (FIL) transfers

- Solana SPL Token Support
- KIN (KIN) migration Support
- KAVA Token Support
- Estimation gas limit was improved when full amount transfers for Filecoin (FIL) blockchain
- Fixed issue when custom token added with lowercased contract value
- Registration for push notification was improved
- Improve VeChain (VET) fee calculation

- Cross swap works as usually now when needs to approve token
- Easy to see entered amount when uses prefilled value on swap
- Theta (THETA) broadcast transaction improved
- Price alerts shows correct subscribed coins for single and multi-coin wallets now
- Kava (KAVA) unstake works correct now

- Fix Tezos pending transaction check
- Language option in Preferences
- Support adding KAVA and WAVES custom tokens
- Support collectibles for Binance Smart Chain
- Fixed issue when fee did not recalculate when gas is changed
- Improved price rounding in exchange
- Fixed issue when sometimes KAVA transfers fails as not enough gas
- Security settings was merged into one screen for simplicity
- Dynamic nodes for Ethereum
- Screen of receiving address was improved
- Added explanation message about network fee
- Applied latest Cosmos Network upgrades, now works as usual

- Applied latest Cosmos Network upgrades, now works as usual
- DOT transferring improved
- Enhancement of showing FIO address on receive screen
- Added the ability to open marker info from alerts screen
- WalletConnect reconnection when app comes back from background improved
- Improved fee calculation when sending max amount of VTHO

- Binance Staking Support 
- Pending transaction updating improved 
- Cross transfer integrated into Swap tab 
- Improve error message for UTXO

- BNB Staking Support
- Full support for ERC1155 NFTs 
- Improve WalletConnect connectivity
- Improve Kava claim rewards

- Improve assets search on wallet screen
- User interface of confirmation screen improve: easy to top up balance if not enought to cover fee and to identify what asset swaps

- Improve unstacking functionality, remaining time shows for pending delegation
- User interface of market screen improve: 1 hour interval added, minimum and maximum price show on selected interval
- Buy crypto functionality supports the ability to choose specific provider for buying

- Improve unstacking functionality, remaining time shows for pending delegation

The DApp browser has been removed from this and all future versions of the iOS app. Coins/tokens sent to DApps are safe; you can continue using DApps from your preferred web browser using WalletConnect. Visit community.trustwallet.com for details. Other enhancements in this version include:
- Added support for Thorchain (RUNE)
- User interface of transaction details improvements
- Improved WalletConnect connectivity

- Thorchain (RUNE), Polkadot (DOT) transaction works as expected
- User interface of market and transaction confirmation screen improvements

- Add support for Polygon (MATIC) blockchain 
- Multi session support for WalletConnect
- Add support for NFT video and audio

- Improve WalletConnect connectivity
- Improve Ethereum transfers
- Improve WalletConnect connectivity

- Introduce Discover functionality to stay on top of crypto market
- 1Inch Protocol integration for swaps
- Improve recovery phrase import
- Improve QR Code parsing for EIP681 standard
